Title: Episode 8
Plot: MI5 investigate the assassination of a Muslim cleric outside the high court, and uncover a radicalised Christian who is determined to incite a religious war.
GuestStars: Matthew Blackmore,  Sam Woodward,  Hassani Shapi,  Pip Torrens,  Shaun Dingwall,  Lennie James,  James Dicker,  Gugu  Mbatha-Raw
